title: I'm Starting to see a Bad Pattern with New Champions
body: The last two champions (Illaoi and Jhin) both have quotes of disgust towards Rek'Sai. I really don't want this to become a common thing for new champions. Riot, please show more love for my burrowing void baby. {{item:3070}} {{champion:421}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: They're just jealous because Rek'sai is #1

The last two champions also had the same primary writer from Narrative, who also worked on Tahm Kench and Rek'Sai's.

So yeah, I think it's ok.

WaaarghBobo! was the principal Narrative Writer for Champ Team on Jhin, Illaoi, Tahm Kench and Rek'Sai. FauxSchizzle was on Kindred and Ekko and <redacted> as well as <nothing to see here, move along>.

WaarghBobo! is far more unsettling than Rek'Sai (she's more terrifying though).

Both WG and FS are repulsed by Rek'Sai.

But they're more repulsed by my bad jokes and affinity for stirring up trouble.

(Honestly, it's just a case of what the characters' perspectives would be. We all have a soft spot for Rek'Sai really).

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X85A9IRl,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-01-18T08:36:31.629+0000)
_**<redacted> as well as <nothing to see here, move along>.**_
WHAT DO YOU MEAN
I just mean <These aren't the droids you're looking for. Move along. Move along.>

Sad thing is, those were indeed the droids you were looking for.

Feels bad man

Oh wait. It must be the next champ after Jhin. Let me guess:

A synthetic mid laner who is the "true mage" that was mentioned about a month ago for this year who is likely linked to Viktor since he's the machinist guy? Am I at least warm? :P
I think you misunderstood what  meddler  meant by mechanics lol

? It's kind of a joke. Guess it went over your head a bit. 

The mention of the mage thing was just referencing the idea that the last true mage was Azir over a year ago. Just speculation. Being a mid laner, most pure mages are.

The synthetic aspect was a reference to his mention of an obvious Star Wars quote that mentions droids that were being sought but the troopers got tricked into thinking it not the case. An analogous situation could be ours currently. 

Being linked to Viktor, basically every robot character is in some fashion, as well as most robot skins.

If you want to provide a link for the article when that was discussed so I can refresh my memory, I'd appreciate it, but I was mostly talking from a generalistic standpoint for the sake of semantics.
So Gary, how was bring-your-daughter-to-work day?
For the record, both WaarghBobo and FauxSchizzle did really great jobs on their respective champions!

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X85A9IRl,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-01-18T08:36:31.629+0000)
> 
> But they're more repulsed by my bad jokes and affinity for stirring up trouble.

Good. That just means you should do it more. lol

> Good. That just means you should do it more. lol

Relevant username.

> [{quoted}](name=Hyrum Graff,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X85A9IRl,comment-id=0003000100030000,timestamp=2016-01-24T17:46:48.852+0000)
>
> Relevant username.

What?? My name is relevant?? lol

Rrrrrrrredacted? :3
https://youtu.be/b3lF83_60cw?t=178
Oh okay. Didn't realize they worked on Rek'Sai too.
Illaoi hates all voids so using her is a bad example and if I remember correctly that jhin quote is only on his skins
Rek'Sai: *loud crying screeches*
You forgot to mention every champion and their mother has at least two references for KataGaren since Tahm came out...
A lot of new champions seem to enjoy making fun of Varus too.
Rek sai is even a female further more hurting rek sai :/
Why is this downvoted even? Here i am trying to defend ms.reksai... Clearly the sommuners hate reksai in general so rude >_>
Rek'sai's gender is irrelevant for this discussion, you were downvoted because you brought in something unnecessary to the discussion.
